items.title: Amazon is selling a pair of noise-canceling wireless earbuds for just $25

items.title: Struggling retailer to sell brand in $1 billion deal amid debt crisis
items.description: The move comes less than a year after the brand's acquisition, as the retailer battles with mounting debt and industry challenges.

items.title: Comcast plans harsh wake-up call for employees as customers flee
items.description: Comcast is quietly planning a harsh workforce change as it rapidly loses customers.

items.title: Macy's is selling 'the softest' lightweight comforter set for $24
